nl.marcvanzee.KEProver.lib
Class FormulaComp

java.lang.Object
  nl.marcvanzee.KEProver.lib.FormulaComp

public class FormulaComp
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of static methods that are used for the comparison of two objects of the Subformula class.

Author:
marc

          verifies whether two Subformulas are equal, meaning that they have equal

Constructor Detail

FormulaComp

public FormulaComp()
Method Detail

equals

public static boolean equals(Subformula sub1,
                             Subformula sub2)
verifies whether two Subformulas are equal, meaning that they have equal
negations, and equal connectives and subformulas. This is verified recursively
until the literals are compared, which of course also should be equal.

Parameters:
sub1 - the first Subformula
sub2 - the second Subformula
Returns:
true if sub1 is equal to sub2, else false

isContradiction

public static boolean isContradiction(Subformula sub1,
                                      Subformula sub2)
verify whether two subformulas contradict. this is the case when one of
them has 1 negation, and the other one 0, but they are for the rest the same.

Parameters:
sub1 - first subformula
sub2 - second subformula
Returns:
true if formulas contradicts, false otherwise.

shortestFormula

public static Subformula shortestFormula(Subformula sub1,
                                         Subformula sub2)
Parameters:
sub1 -
sub2 -
Returns:
returns shortest formula, without parentheses
